snippet: A questionable call by an outfield umpire cooled a potential Braves rally as they lost a wild-card play-in game. But it was hardly the first controversial call to affect a postseason game.
abstract: Questionable call by outfield umpire cools a potential Atlanta Braves rally as they lose wild-card play-in game to St Louis Cardinals, but is is hardly the first controversial call to affect a postseason game.
lead_paragraph: A questionable call by an outfield umpire cooled a potential Braves rally as they lost a wild-card play-in game. But it was hardly the first controversial call to affect a postseason game.

headline.seo: With Umpires in the Outfield Come Postseason Errors in Judgment
headline.main: Umpires in the Outfield Can Produce Errors in Judgment in the Postseason
headline.print_headline: Umpires in the Outfield Can Produce Errors in Judgment in the Postseason
